## Trying Stuff Out

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv('data/posmo0.csv')

# df.plot(x='lon_x', y='lat_y')
# plt.show()
```

```{python}
import geopandas as gpd

gdf = gpd.GeoDataFrame(
  df, geometry = gpd.points_from_xy(df.lon_x, df.lat_y)
)
gdf.plot(cmap='hot')
plt.show()
```
